info.name: GPBible API - Complete Collection
info.description: Complete collection of endpoints for the GPBible API

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Endpoints for authentication and user management

request.description: Import postman-auth-endpoints.json to view authentication endpoints
Import postman-users-endpoints.json to view user endpoints

item.name: Bible and Denominations
item.description: Endpoints for Bible versions and denominations

item.name: Messaging
item.description: Endpoints for private and group messaging

request.description: Import postman-user-preferences.json to view preference endpoints

item.name: Notifications
item.description: Endpoints for managing notifications and notification preferences

request.description: Import postman-notifications.json to view notification endpoints

item.name: Onboarding
item.description: Endpoints for new user onboarding process

request.description: Import postman-onboarding.json to view onboarding endpoints

item.name: App Ratings
item.description: Endpoints for app ratings and feedback

request.description: Import postman-app-ratings.json to view rating endpoints

item.name: Subscriptions
item.description: Endpoints for subscription and premium features management

request.description: Import postman-subscriptions.json to view subscription endpoints
Import postman-tour.json to view app tour endpoints
Import postman-dashboard.json to view dashboard endpoints
Import postman-meditation.json to view meditation endpoints
Import postman-immersive-content.json to view immersive content endpoints

item.name: Spiritual Assessment
item.description: Endpoints for spiritual assessments and growth tracking

request.description: Import postman-spiritual-assessment.json to view spiritual assessment endpoints

item.name: Donations
item.description: Endpoints for donations and charitable payments management

request.description: Import postman-donations.json to view donation endpoints

item.name: AI Avatars
item.description: Endpoints for AI avatars for spiritual assistance

request.description: Import postman-ai-avatars.json to view AI avatar endpoints

item.name: AI Chat
item.description: Endpoints for interaction with AI virtual assistants

request.description: Import postman-ai-chat.json to view AI chat endpoints

item.name: Spiritual Growth
item.description: Endpoints for spiritual growth tracking and development

request.description: Import postman-spiritual-growth.json to view spiritual growth endpoints
